noun.description: Art, objects, or design considered to be in poor taste because of excessive garishness or sentimentality, but sometimes appreciated in an ironic or knowing way.
examples: the lava lamp is an example of sixties kitsch

adjective.description: Considered to be in poor taste but appreciated in an ironic or knowing way.
examples: the front room is stuffed with kitsch knickknacks, little glass and gilt ornaments
she offers kitsch interpretations of classic British dress, including a range of tartan mini-kilts
